content: julia is the seventh floral granny square in the welcoming blanket 1 a mystery crochet along for a throw blanket made up of nine 12 floral granny square patterns with borders julia has a 6-petal flower at the center which is inspired by the petals on the april daisy square by margaret hubert 2 > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 3 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch treble_crochet crocheting in the round increasing crocheting in chain spaces includes video tutorial special stitch pattern decrease includes written instructions and link to photo tutorial in pattern special stitch pattern hdc2tog includes written instructions and video tutorial in pattern **skill level** easy **finished size** 12 30 5 cm square **materials** caron one pound yarn 100% acrylic 16 oz/454 g/812 yd/742 m 1 skein each in 02005 sun yellow ca 10517 rose cb and 10620 grass green *or approximately 80 yd 73 m in ca 45 yd 41 m in cb and 35 yd 32 m in cc in any medium weight yarn* clover amour us size j-10/6 mm crochet hook *or size needed to obtain gauge* yarn needle **gauge** motif = 12 30 5 cm square *exact gauge is not critical for this project * 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2024/05/24/welcoming-blanket-crochet-along/ 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2017/06/23/crochet-pattern-april-daisy-square/ 3 https //undergroundcrafter com/2024/07/12/crochet-pattern-julia-floral-granny-square/
